    APB2017

    These materials can be installed as an R package:

    devtools::install_github("wrightaprilm/APB2018")

    Slides are meant to be rendered in RStudio.

    Schedule

    Day One

    Item Time
    Intro & begin installs 9 - 9:30
    About Me 9:30 - 9:45
    Intro to Phylogenetic Data 9:45 - 10:30
    Break 10:30 - 10:45
    Phylogenetic Data Hands On 10:45 - Noon
    Lunch 12 - 1
    Tree Thinking I 1 - 2:30
    Break 2:30 - 2:45
    Tree Thinking II 2:45-5

    Day Two

    Item Time
    Introduction to Bayesian Models 9 - 10:30
    Break 10:30 - 10:45
    Models and reality 10:45 - Noon
    Lunch 12 - 1
    Graphical models, on board exercise 1 - 2:30
    Break 2:30 - 2:45
    RevBayes Dicrete Morphology 2:45-5

    Day Three

    Item Time
    Introduction to Divergence Time Estimation 9 - 10:30
    Break 10:30 - 10:45
    Continued: Div Time Exercise 10:45 - Noon
    Lunch 12 - 1
    RevBayes FBD 1 - 2:30
    Break 2:30 - 2:45
    Finish RevBayes Div Time 2:45-5
